main.connection

Class Connection

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.connection.Connection
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FileConnection, RingConnection

    public class Connection
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides the basic methods to start and close a connection with a specified host
    Author:
    Martini Davide Distributed Systems class (AY 2017/2018), University of Padua, Master's degree in Computer Engineering.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void closeConnection()
      This method closes a connection which was opened with a contact node
      protected void startConnection()
      This method starts a connection with a contact node

      • Connection

        public Connection(java.net.InetSocketAddress nodeAd)
        Unique constructor of the class
        Parameters:
        nodeAd - It specifies the address of the node that the invoker wants to contact

    • Method Detail

      • startConnection

        protected void startConnection()
                        throws java.io.IOException
        This method starts a connection with a contact node
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - In case the contact node is null or the connection fails

      • closeConnection

        protected void closeConnection()
                        throws java.io.IOException
        This method closes a connection which was opened with a contact node
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - In case the connection closing fails
